comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Wonderful portrait. Robinson was Governor of NSW in the period 1872-1879. Here's his ADB entry adb.anu.edu.au/biography/robinson-sir-hercules-george-4493 ; the SLNSW have several similar pics of Sir Hercules acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemDetailPaged.aspx?itemID=63231
